title: The bug splat
body:
League Of Legends pls dont ban my acc with the leacer buster. it was the bug splat from my pc.
Who was with leaver buster from bug splat comment at me. (-_- ) the bug splat problem

replies.body:
An account can be marked by leaverbuster only after consistent leaves, and not just a single game.  I know that something like a bug splat might be out of your control, but the system treats all leaves equally because they cause others a poor experience for being down a player.  

I would like to help out with your issue!  A bug splat error is usually due to an issue with your game files rendering properly, which can be caused by driver or corrupt files issues.  I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide which will provide some steps to get this fixed up for you.  Hope that helps!
